src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LP : Where is room 17 ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] LP : How long before my appointment ? [MASK] RC : ARI , can you ... sorry ... He is n't responding . RC : ARI ? ARI : I 'll call a nurse to come and inform you . RC : ARI , I do n't have a watch , is there a clock in the room so I can find out the time ? [MASK] [end] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception .

src: LC : I 'd prefer a hot chocolate . @ G ( LC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RP : And why not herbal tea ? @ G ( RP , drink ( herbal_tea ) ) [start] LC : Well , yes . [MASK] RP : To de-stress . [MASK] RP : Could we have a hot drink to relax a bit ? We 're a little bit annoyed , stressed out from all of this . The hospital is complicated , is n't it ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , there 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] RP : Well , great , thank you . [MASK] LC : I see a sign , but I do n't know what it means . RP : Ah . LC : Is it a round trip ? RP : Ah , ah , yes . RP : How do we get to the ground floor , do we take the lift ? How do we do it ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , the lifts are at the entrance on the left . [end] RP : Ah great , thank you . @ CG ( LC+RP , go_to ( ground_floor ) ) RP : Goodbye . ARI : You 're welcome . RP : We do n't need you anymore , goodbye . ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . RP : Great , well , we 're done .

src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . But um , how long does it last because there are three phases , if I understood correctly there are three ... three types of appointments , I 'd like to know how long it will last in total . [start] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . LC : Where can I get information ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RP : Ok , I 'm going to ask you a question ARI . I have an appointment at Broca hospital on the 25th , but I 'm not going to be able to make it . What do I do ? Who should I speak to ? Should I phone , what should I do ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : Is there a reception or a telephone number ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . From what time until what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] LC : And ... Is it ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : And ... Is it possible to have lunch with someone who is hospitalised ? ARI : Yes of course . LC : How should I do this ? Do I need to make a reservation ? ARI : No . LC : How far in advance ? ARI : No . [end] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [start] LP : Hello I I 'd really like I 'm hungry I 'd really like to eat . And is the room air-conditioned ? The restaurant ? RC : Oh , okay , thank you very much . ARI : Thank you . ARI : See you around . Have a nice day .

src: LP : Well , yeah , but you do what you want . LP : What time is my appointment with the doctor ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RC : I think it 's 10 o'clock . @ AG ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RC : What time is the appointment ? @ G ( RC , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RC : I have an appointment with the doctor . @ G ( RC , get-info ( appt ( general_info ) ) ) ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . @ AG ( RC , get-info ( appt ( general_info ) ) ) LP : And who is my geriatrician ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RC : That 's a shame . LP : And where is the consultation room to go see my doctor ? RC : Is it my turn ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RC : Is it right or left ? Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well .
